name: WordPerfect to LaTeX convertor

screenshots.caption: Windows GUI frontend for WP2LaTeX - file selection.

short_description: WP2LaTeX is a program for conversion WordPerfect MAC1.x, 2.x, 3.x and PC 4.x,5.x,6.x documents to LaTeX. Converted features are: Headers, Tables, Equations, Centered+ Right+ Left text, a lot of extended characters (greek, math,cyrilic) and of course a normal text.
